meanings.definition: A rich, creamy pasta sauce typically made with butter, Parmesan cheese, and heavy cream.
meanings.sent1: I love the alfredo sauce on my pasta.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves delicious alfredo pasta.
meanings.sent3: The alfredo sauce was so good, I wanted to lick the plate!
meanings.sent4: Her alfredo sauce was like a comforting hug in a bowl.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the alfredo sauce filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A dish made with fettuccine pasta and a sauce consisting of butter, Parmesan cheese, and heavy cream.
meanings.sent1: My favorite dish is fettuccine alfredo.
meanings.sent2: She ordered the classic alfredo for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The alfredo dish was so creamy, it felt like eating a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The alfredo pasta was a symphony of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant's signature alfredo was a culinary masterpiece.
